ygData.subject: Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, My bf and i just made charchters on the  new roleplay server but i still feel weirrd becasue i dont really ant to split my time between my other
ygData.messageBody:
Well,

My bf and i just made charchters on the new roleplay server but i still
feel weirrd becasue i dont really ant to split my time between my other
chatchter on Rodcet nife, or end up abdoning him!!! :( My boyfreind feels
the same way, so maybe the multiple server guild idea is good! I think
that the unity suggestion is a good start, maybe the guild constitution
(or whgatveer ytou call it) could be that we seeks to bring all the races,
sexes, sexual oreintatiin, species in Norrath togethe rin unity :) sound
cool? we should also state that it was started but GLBT poele in norrath
because they felt the pain of a dis-unified world...ehehhehe i love it (i
obviously am a role-player) So thats my 10 cents, also I know of 3 other
poeple on Rodcet nife as of now that may be willing to join thius kind of
guild so if anyone on rodcet Nife would like to e-mial me and let me know
they want to be a part of it that would be cool, i wouldnt mind being the
guild master for Rodcet nife, maybe someone form each server should
volunteer to do this so we can start to expedite things. What do you all
think of thhis? If it dosnt fly, looks like i'[m be plkaying on the new
server a bit :)


-joe
